abstract: Verizon is expected to announce full-length programming to its cellular subscribers from several major television networks.
snippet: Verizon is expected to announce full-length programming to its cellular subscribers from several major television networks.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES, Jan. 5  Verizon Wireless is expected to announce on Sunday that it will offer full-length programming to its cellular subscribers from several major television networks, according to people apprised of the deal.

headline.main: Verizon to Announce Plan for TV Shows on Cellphones
headline.print_headline: Verizon to Announce Plan For TV Shows on Cellphones
